name: InfoWar
description:
EARLY PROTOTYPE!

this game lets you fight and collect Information of Wikipedia Articles in Pokemon Style. Depending on the search terms a different narrative emerges for the player, highly shaped by his personal interests. Through the openess and randomness of the encounters, you could hit Free Speech with World Peace for 69 damage ;) 

I am currently rewriting the whole game, for tutorialisation and visual fluff.
